cast.overview: Back from the brink of death, highly skilled commando Tyler Rake takes on another dangerous mission: saving the imprisoned family of a ruthless gangster.
cast.title: Extraction 2

details.biography:
Andro Japaridze is a young actor, who was born on March 26, 2002, in Tbilisi, Georgia. He is well known for his latest act in the Hollywood movie "Extraction 2" by Netflix, which is the sequel to "Extraction"(2020). He portrayed the character of Sandro. Furthermore, Andro played the main character Dato, in the movie "Andro" directed by Tornike Gogrichiani. The actor has experience in other Georgian TV series and movies. Andro is continuing his acting career with great determination. By: Tamta Tordia, Journalist of popular Georgian online newspaper primetime

- IMDb Mini Biography By: Tamta Tordia, Journalist of popular Georgian online newspaper primetime
details.name: Andro Japaridze
